mapper.insert: insert into ty_control_int_0 (id, plc_id, spot_name, spot_desc, modbus_address, value, created) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{plcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spotDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modbusAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into plc_pro_01(config_id, p_name, p_desc, p_type, model, modbus_addr, p_value, cyc, group_code, created) values
(#{item.id},#{item.name},#{item.desc},#{item.type},#{item.model}, #{item.modbusAddr}, #{item.Value}, #{item.cyc}, #{item.groupCode}, now())
